description:
Apply this class name to a CustomCard which contains a CardHeader.
The CardHeader will have the appropriate vertical spacing, so this
className will remove the card's default padding-top.

Apply this class name to a card where the only content
is a table. The card can still have a Header / Footer,
but this class will get the card's padding correct.

context.name: .bolt-table-card

description:
Text color to use on communication (colored) backgrounds.
This is always a light color independent of light/dark theme.
Makes an element a row-based flex box, with items aligned center and no margin/padding.

context.name: .flex-cell

description: Indicates another layer should be used (z-index: 10)
Makes an element absolutely positioned and fill the entire space.

context.name: .absolute-fill

description: 2px padding used for icons within a link.
2px vertical padding used for text within a link.

Removes all margin from an element.
Not intended to be used as the default, only to override defaults

Adds 8px of margin to all sides of the element
Adds 16px of margin to all sides of the element

Adds 16px of margin to the bottom leaving the other sides unaffected

Makes an element a row-based flex-box, flex-grow: 1, and overflow: hidden.

Overrides the default scrollbar with a custom one.
Only works in browsers supporting webkit-scrollbar or scrollbar-color/width.

context.name: .custom-scrollbar

description:
Sets up a basic animation intended to mock the data shape being
loaded with a small shimmer effect.

context.name: .shimmer

description: This shimmer-line style will use a wide animation and provide proportional corners to look like a line.
This shimmer-circle-small style will use a circular element with a thin animation, this is used for small prefixes.

context.name: .shimmer-circle-small

description: This shimmer-circle-large style will use a circular element with a thin animation, this is used for large prefixes.

context.name: .shimmer-circle-large

description: Apply to an element to make its text ellipsis (a parent must have overflow hidden)

context.name: .text-ellipsis

description: Ensure text wraps even when there are no appropriate break characters.

context.name: .word-break

description: Apply to an element t make the text within it selectable.

context.name: fontFamily
context.value:
"Segoe UI", "-apple-system", BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Ubuntu, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji",
    "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"

description: Uses a monospaced font family (Menlo, Consolas, Courier New, monospace)
Apply to actions that should appear right aligned.
Apply to a cell's content if the cell contains only a link.
Apply to a cell's content if the cell contains an inline link, along with other content.
Apply to a cell's content if the cell contains a button.
Apply bolt-table-link to a link in a table.

context.name: .bolt-table-link.bolt-link

description:
Apply to a link in a table that is inline - meaning there are multiple links
or other non-link content in the cell.
Apply to your cell's content to only show on row hover/focus
Apply the 'subtle' className to your TextField to have a subtle background (inherit rather than forced white/black).
Apply the 'hide-border' className to your TextField to have a border only on hover/focus.

When buttons are placed into a breadcrumb we will update the visuals to match the other
breadcrumb items.

Apply to your content within a page to get standard left/right/bottom padding.
    @group page|layout

context.name: .page-content

description:
Apply to your content within a page to get standard top paddding
    @group page|layout

Apply to your content within a page to get standard bottom paddding
    @group page|layout

Apply to your content within a page to get standard left paddding
    @group page|layout

Apply to your content within a page to get standard right paddding
    @group page|layout
